text: 1.21: Zo 14.6; FG 2.24; 2.33; Ro 4.24; 5.1-2; 10.9; Fi 2.9; Hi 2.9; 1 Pi 3.22Ana kɨrar hɨgap, nden kurkurigim, nde Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgi. Fhe Bakɨme Krais rimgim, ana taagia ana khavgiap, zɨ bakɨmen ana nɨɨŋgi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgap, ana nden nɨɨn za suaŋgi bigi, nde ntan rarga ki.
